title: Will AI destroy us?
body:
Technology is a great feature and artificial intelligence evolves fast. 
 I understand that GPT-3 could make a bit of fear because it seems so humane 
 but I don’t think any AI could ever be smarter than the whole humanity... 
 and human humor is very complex btw...

title: What is design for you?
body:
I like to draw as well. 
 Designing is very similar. 
 You have the power to create something new and can control how it looks and behaves. 
 Who of us never wanted to be like 'Bob the Builder'?

title: What is the sense of life?
body:
42! 
 In my opinion the sense of life for a human is to be happy. 
 Of course you cannot be happy every millisecond of your life. That’s not what I mean. But you should do everything you can to when it all comes to an end be satisfied with what you had achieved in your life.
